name: S&P/ASX 50
summary: The S&P/ASX 50 is a stock market index of 50 of the largest companies listed on the Australian Securities Exchange (ASX). It is a market-capitalization weighted index.

name: ALL ORDINARIES
summary: The ALL ORDINARIES is a market-capitalization weighted index of Australian-incorporated companies listed on the Australian Securities Exchange. It represents the performance of the 500 largest companies by market capitalization and serves as a benchmark for the overall Australian stock market. The index is designed to provide investors with a broad measure of the Australian equity market.

name: S&P/ASX 50 OPIC
summary: S&P/ASX 50 OPIC is a customized index that is designed and calculated by S&P Dow Jones Indices and based on the S&P/ASX 50, which is a sub-index of the S&P/ASX 200, that measures the performance of 50 of the largest capitalisation companies in the S&P/ASX 200 index, and adjusted for the requirements of OPIC (Overseas Private Investment Corporation). OPIC screens for Australian companies involved in prohibited activities like gambling and weapons manufacturing and other considerations, meaning this is an index for a segment of the market with specific ESQ requirements.

name: S&P/ASX 200 OPIC
summary: S&P/ASX 200 OPIC is a customized index that is designed and calculated by S&P Dow Jones Indices and based on the S&P/ASX 200 that screens for Australian companies involved in prohibited activities like gambling and weapons manufacturing and other considerations, meaning this is an index for a segment of the market with specific ESQ requirements. The index follows the S&P/ASX 200 which is an index of the top 200 companies based on market capitalisation in Australia.

name: S&P/ASX Resources OPIC
summary: S&P/ASX Resources OPIC is a sub-index of the S&P/ASX 200, focused on the resources sector, that is designed and calculated by S&P Dow Jones Indices and adjusted for the requirements of OPIC (Overseas Private Investment Corporation). This means it screens for Australian companies involved in prohibited activities like gambling and weapons manufacturing and other considerations, making it an index for a segment of the resources market with specific ESQ requirements.
